name: Refuge Island
description:
Refuge Island is a little game made for the Mini Jam 50: Islands. 

I didn't want to follow my first impulse (a treasure hunt in a tropical island), so pedestrian/refuge islands came to my mind. I decided to keep all the action in a tiny place of a big city to follow the limitation of the Jam: it had to be a one level game.

"Am I lost?" maybe all we need is a refuge island to get to our very own human.

Special thanks to Jaime Yañez (@caballitodefuego).

Thank you for playing!

Valerie
